JobFullDesc: Are you looking to make an immediate impact where you can help our clients solve their business challenges? Deloitte's Core Business Operations (CBO) portfolio operates at the center of our client's business. By joining our team, you could help C-suite and program leaders transform their organization and accelerate mission execution through emerging and disruptive technologies, innovative business models, retooled program operations and industry-driven solutions.  Work you'll do:  Responsible for managing the teams Azure Cloud Platform and providing product vision and strategy, project management, and marketing coordination. Essential duties and responsibilities:  Collaborate with the product development team to improve their skills and identify growth and leadership opportunities.  Collaborate with CMS platform teams to resolve issues or gaps identified in platform capabilities that impact project delivery.  Support the pricing, proposal, and statement of work (SOW) process to establish standardized delivery.  Build standardized sales collateral and sales tools to help scale CMS business development.  Work with the CMS finance team to support financial reporting process through forecasting of resources and management of infrastructure costs for projects.  Work with Service Delivery Manager (SDMs), Director (PPMDs), and other team members to manage client relationships and communications.  Notify Cloud Managed Services (CMS) and leadership of any potential escalations related to project delivery.  Review the completeness and quality of the documentation for the work completed by the team.  The team   Our Cloud Engineering team focuses on enabling our client's end-to-end journey from On-Premise to Cloud, with opportunities in the areas of: Cloud Strategy, Op Model Transformation, Cloud Development, Cloud Integration & APIs, Cloud Migration, Cloud Infrastructure & Engineering, and Cloud Managed Services. We help our clients see the transformational capabilities of Cloud as an opportunity for business enablement and competitive advantage. Cloud Engineering supports our clients as they improve agility and resilience and identifies opportunities to reduce IT operations spend through automation by enabling Cloud. We accelerate our clients towards a technology-driven future, leveraging vendor solutions and Deloitte-developed software products, tools, and accelerators.  Qualifications   Required:  4+ years' experience with Product Management in a Cloud, SAAS, or PAAS environment  Bachelor's Degree.  Experience with agile and SDLC.  Experience developing product visions and roadmaps.  Experience with design patterns and API-driven architectures.  Experiencing managing projects and cross-functional teams.  Must be legally authorized to work in the United States without the need for employer sponsorship, now or at any time in the future. Preferred:  Experience with Azure and solution architecture.  Project management or product owner certification(s).  Experience implementing CI/CD pipelines and designing DevOps solutions.
